pages.text: Russell Terriers, known by various names, were originally bred to hunt foxes both above and below ground.$(br2)These small dogs are only about half a block tall, but make up for it with their fierce nature. They come in six different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in various taiga biomes. They can also be found in snowy plains, and more rarely in groves.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
